hero.name: Abdellahi Ahmed
hero.description: I'm not just learning technology — I'm building real products that solve real problems. Driven by purpose, discipline, and long-term vision, I design and develop modern Web and Mobile applications with a strong engineering mindset. My work bridges backend systems, clean architectures, and user-focused experiences, turning ideas into reliable, scalable solutions.
about.title: My Journey
about.subtitle: Aspiring Network Engineer and FullStack Developer, hands-on with network automation, Linux, real-world programming, and problem-solving.
about.story1: I am focused on growing into a senior Web & Mobile Developer with a strong Network Engineering foundation, building production-ready applications that are secure, scalable, and aligned with real organizational needs. My background spans web and mobile systems, server environments, and enterprise networking, supported by strong communication and leadership skills.
about.story2: My journey includes full-stack application projects, network design and simulation, and hands-on work with Linux-based systems. Through academic and personal projects, I’ve designed complete solutions end-to-end — from architecture and implementation to testing and optimization — delivering reliable results under real constraints.
about.story3: I believe that clean architecture, intelligent automation, and cross-team collaboration are what drive high-performing tech organizations. Every project I take on is an opportunity to improve system quality, strengthen my engineering judgment, and create measurable real-world impact.

network.title: Network & Infrastructure
network.subtitle: Cisco IOS/NX-OS, BGP/OSPF, VLAN/VXLAN, Wireshark/NetFlow
points: Design and troubleshoot routed/switched topologies with segmentation and QoS.
Automate discovery, inventory, and config validation with Python tooling.
Harden access with ACLs, secure management, and observability.

automation.title: Automation & Backend
automation.subtitle: Python/Node, REST APIs, CI/CD for network ops
points: Build APIs and workers that orchestrate network tasks and enforce policy.
Ship CI/CD pipelines with checks, linting, and deployment hooks.
Instrument code with logging/metrics for faster incident triage.

frontend.title: Frontend & Operator UX
frontend.subtitle: React/TypeScript dashboards, accessibility-first
points: Deliver clear dashboards for config/state with responsive, accessible UI.
Model components for reuse across status boards and runbooks.
Integrate live data (WebSockets/polling) with graceful degradation.

skills.badge: CCNA (2024) • 30+ GNS3/EVE-NG labs • Python-driven network automation
experience.title: Professional Journey

experience.jobs.description: Developed technical, communication, and project management skills through club projects. Python, Java, OOP, Git, GitHub.
Built advanced virtual labs using Cisco Packet Tracer and GNS3. Completed CCNA through hands-on labs. Developed automated network workflows with Python.

experience.jobs.role: Intern, Network & Systems (Stagiaire Réseaux Informatiques et Admin Systèmes)
experience.jobs.description: Lead developer on AutoNetConfig: a hybrid system for real-time monitoring/automation in enterprise networks (EVE-NG, Python, Linux, Flask, Nmap). Collaborated with technicians and engineers to deploy and visualize automated network solutions.

Contributed to digital and technology projects at MCS Consulting, a firm specialized in financial consulting, ERP solutions, and digital transformation. Worked on the design and improvement of modern web solutions, ensuring alignment between business requirements, corporate visual identity, and user experience.

education.title: Academic Background
education.label: Academic Journey
education.heading: Explore my academic journey and continuous learning
education.subtitle: Building strong foundations through formal education and self-directed study
education.lifelong_description: Beyond formal education, I continuously expand my knowledge through online courses, certifications, and hands-on projects in networking, automation, and software development. Learning never stops.

education.schools.institution: ISCAE Mauritania (Institut Supérieur de Comptabilité et d’Administration des Entreprises)
education.schools.description: Academic training in networks, IT, and digital infrastructure. Strong focus on systems integration, automation, secure network setups, and rapid adaptability in tech environments.
Specialization in mathematics and physical sciences, graduated with top GPA. Built strong foundations in logic, analysis, and scientific problem-solving for modern tech, programming, and networks.

projects.title: My Work
projects.subtitle: Operator-grade builds for automation, visibility, and reliable delivery.
projects.responsibilities: Architected and developed the complete solution

projects.items.title: AutoNetConfig
projects.items.description: Hybrid real-time visualization and automation tool for network infrastructure using EVE-NG, Nmap, Flask, and Python scripting. Built for enterprise network administration.

projects.items.title: Traiteurs App
projects.items.description: Flutter mobile app (iOS & Android) for ordering wedding catering services, powered by Supabase. Covers three user spaces: client (search, order, cart, payment, real-time tracking), caterer (menu management, order tracking, stats), and delivery driver (assignment & live tracking).

projects.items.title: MCS Consulting
projects.items.description: Official corporate website for MCS Consulting, a firm specialized in financial consulting, ERP solutions, and digital transformation. Designed and developed a modern, responsive web presence reflecting the company's professional identity and service offerings.

projects.items.title: GestionParc
projects.items.description: Full-featured fleet management ERP module built for Dolibarr. Covers the complete vehicle lifecycle: real-time status tracking, maintenance workflows with preventive alerts, material inventory with reservation system, and fuel monitoring with photo proof and automatic consumption calculation. Dashboard with 15+ KPIs, granular permissions, CSRF protection, and bilingual FR/EN interface.

projects.items.title: Gestion Archivage & Courrier
projects.items.description: Web & desktop document management and mail tracking application built with vanilla JavaScript and Supabase. Features real-time dashboard with KPIs, full document CRUD with automatic versioning, incoming/outgoing mail tracking with deadline indicators, internal messaging, bulk CSV import, drag-and-drop scanner upload, RBAC administration with full audit logs, and bilingual FR/AR with RTL support. Deployed as SPA and Electron desktop app.

projects.items.title: Traiteurs Admin
projects.items.description: Full-featured back-office web app for managing a catering platform. Real-time dashboard with order and revenue stats, caterer validation and approval workflows, end-to-end order status management, delivery module with driver assignment and earnings tracking, integrated notifications and FAQ system, and role-based authentication (admin, caterer, driver, client).

projects.items.title: Clinique El Ihsane
projects.items.description: Bilingual medical clinic website (French/Arabic with full RTL support) built with React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and GSAP. Features online appointment booking, headless CMS via Strapi v5 with Cloudinary media, Nodemailer contact system, 30+ reusable components across 7 pages, WCAG AA accessibility, and performance optimization with lazy loading and code splitting.
